mapper.insert:
select seq_menu.nextval from dual
insert into tb_menu (resNum, menuNum, menuName, menuAcoount, mainIngredient, serving, unitCost, menuImg) values (#{resNum}, #{menuNum}, #{menuName}, #{menuAcoount}, #{mainIngredient}, #{serving}, #{unitCost}, #{menuImg})
mapper.update: update tb_menu set menuName = #{menuName}, menuAcoount = #{menuAcoount}, mainIngredient = #{mainIngredient}, serving = #{serving}, unitCost = #{unitCost}, menuImg = #{menuImg} where menuNum = #{menuNum}
mapper.select: select count(menuNum) from tb_menu where resNum = #{resNum}
